lead_paragraph: Coaches view distractions the same as injuries — the fewer the better. That's why Atlantic Coast Conference coaches are cautious about doing an all-access television show such as Showtime's "A Season With."

headline.print_headline: Coaches Wonder if Pros Outweigh the Cons With Access Shows
headline.main: Coaches Wonder if Pros Outweigh the Cons With Access Shows
